page.title: 19MACHINERY,ANIMALS,D.LEER
page.content: The combine harvester will collect the peas in July and barley just before the wheat in August/September.With no pea-canning factory in the area and barley not good enough for seed and malting,all crops go for animal feed. Fungal diseases on the crops and too dry soil in a drought are two of the main problems.The farm has 2 tractors, 1 combine harvester with 2 for spare parts, and a collection of ploughs , discs,harrows and sprays that are used to prepare the soil,sow the seeds, spread fertiliser and generally kill weeds and bugs.The farmer works closely with scientific advisers to get the best yields.The machinery makes it possible to do what once would have needed more men.The farmer is also the mechanic to save money and time.There are many kinds of wildlife tolerated as long as no damage is done
